DataElement.preferredDefinition: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: CDISC Domain Clinical Trial Subject Unique Identifier
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A collection of data variables or metadata for use with a Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) data submission. Representative examples include Laboratory (LB), Subject Characteristics (SC), and Trial Summary (TS)._A unique identifier assigned to each clinical trial subject to protect the subject's identity and used in lieu of the subject's name when the investigator reports adverse events and/or other trial-related data (ICH Guidelines).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A collection of data variables or metadata for use with a Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) data submission. Representative examples include Laboratory (LB), Subject Characteristics (SC), and Trial Summary (TS).

Concepts.definition: A collection of data variables or metadata for use with a Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) data submission. Representative examples include Laboratory (LB), Subject Characteristics (SC), and Trial Summary (TS).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The terminology subset that includes terms relevant to the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) variables._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Elevated to Standard per governance approval by RA. 2021-6-9 ak 1/4/19 tmt released/usage. Created as part of CDISC mapping task. 7.12.18 mc

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Note
ReferenceDocuments.description: This must be a unique number, and could be a compound identifier formed by concatenating STUDYID-SITEID-SUBJID.

ReferenceDocuments.name: AMC CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: If “Yes”, provide participant ID from previous AMC trial

DataElement.changeDescription: 10-3-19 tmt dded question text and released.  Created for CDISC Mapping task 7.13.18 mc
